div.p:

Cambridge,
CB4 0WS
Bailey Fisher is an independent executive search & advisory firm specialising in the high-growth technology market.

Our client has developed a game changing iPad-based diagnostics tool. As the commercial leader of the business, the successful candidate will have experience of introducing software products into a healthcare environment.
